---
name: Add Financial / Expense Tracking
about: Track expense categories, entries, and reporting for club finances
---

### Summary

Add expense categories, expense entries, and related reporting for club finances.

### Acceptance Criteria

- Models/migrations for ExpenseCategory and Expense
- CRUD endpoints and simple UI for adding expenses
- Reporting endpoint for expense summaries (by category/date range)

### Notes

Keep financial features read-only for non-admin users.
